notes: Phase 7 deterministic retrieval-type LLM task suite for Django.
Tasks reference file-level retrieval ground truth in benchmarks/retrieval/django_queries.json via query_id.
The goal is to compare answer quality when the model is given different retrieval-derived context payloads (rg vs semantic vs hybrid) under a fixed context budget.
